{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Tartaglia
|date               = 2023-07-20
|zh                 = 
;今天是达达利亚的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''旅行者：'''达达利亚！
:'''达达利亚：'''旅行者和派蒙？你们怎么来了。
:'''派蒙：'''我们还想问呢…对了这个给你~本想让北国银行给你捎过去，倒是能直接交到你手上啦。
:'''达达利亚：'''有些工作要做，来璃月待几天。
:'''达达利亚：'''这是什么，决战的邀请函？终于要和我一决胜负了吗！
:'''派蒙：'''噫…这个人脑子里只有…不会又是什么打打杀杀的工作吧？
:'''旅行者：'''咳咳，是礼物啦！听说今天是你的生日，生日快乐~
|dialogue_review_zh = 「这是什么，决战的邀请函？终于要和我一决胜负了吗！」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Tartaglia]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Traveler:''' Tartaglia!
:'''Tartaglia:''' Traveler, Paimon? What are you two doing here?
:'''Paimon:''' We were just about to ask you the same question... Oh, right. This is for you~ We were going to get someone from the [[Northland Bank]] to pass this to you, but Paimon didn't expect to be giving it to you in person!
:'''Tartaglia:''' I've got some stuff to do around the city, so I'm staying in Liyue for a few days.
:'''Tartaglia:''' What is this, an invitation to our final battle? Is it finally time to decide the ultimate victor?
:'''Paimon:''' Huh? What's going through that head of his...? Are you here on some murderous business again?
:'''Traveler:''' Ahem. It's a present! We heard it was your birthday. Happy birthday~
|dialogue_review_en = "What is this, an invitation to our final battle? Is it finally decide to decide the ultimate victor?"
}}
